description: In her hidden identity, Sakamoto Rumiko is an influential member of the Eastern Faction of http://anidb.net/ch40598 [Arayashiki], acting there as temporary leader-elect until the impending awakening of http://anidb.net/ch40649 [Benzaiten]. For this goal she is trying to sway her cousin http://anidb.net/ch5896 [Yoriko] into embracing her Arayashiki heritage as she`s fully aware of the http://anidb.net/ch40680 [alternative].
name: Sakamoto Rumiko
